publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2349 Ross Finnie: Water Services etc. (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Water Services etc. (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*
S2M-2349 Ross Finnie: Water Services etc. (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Water Services etc. (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald
